reviews.text: Love the staff here. So helpful and friendly, especially a gentleman called Michael. Even the immigration officers were a pleasure.

Level crossing gates go down 7 minutes before the train arrives.
Great if you're a train passenger. 
But I'm a truck driver trying to get to the other side of the train track to either drop off or collect a trailer.

Rail replacement bus service  from cold remote platform in both directions. Fair walk to check in but it is brightly lit and warm. Foot passengers have to take bus from check in as the boarding plank is out of use. The good news is you can get on board well before departure.
Thankfully , There is a ticketmachine available on platform 2 !!!
worst place ever with no booth and ticket machine to collect the tickets for train!!!!!!!! HORRIBLE!!!!!! BAHHHH!!! do better like Scotland!
